response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value for you at $15,000. This is a fantastic opportunity to acquire a product that is worth more than what you're paying, ensuring you receive the best return on your investment. I trust this proposal will meet your expectations and look forward to your positive response.
